com.netflix.genie.web.jpa.entities.projections

Interface JobProjection

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AuditProjection, BaseProjection, IdProjection, JobCommonFieldsProjection, JobStatusProjection, UniqueIdProjection
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JobEntity

    public interface JobProjection
extends JobCommonFieldsProjection, JobStatusProjection
    Projection for the fields originally available in pre-3.3.0 JobEntity classes.
    Since:
    3.3.0
